title: Xunit fails to load signed test assemblies

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: A fault in an existing feature

body:
Xunit fails to load the assembly containing the tests when this assembly is signed.
It is easily reproducible by creating a empty project, signing it with any key file, adding xunit and running the tests.
The tested version is xunit 2.1 beta 3. It worked in xunit 2.0.

Here is the stacktrace I have using the latest beta 4 build.

```
[xUnit.net 00:00:00.4962886] Unable to de-serialize test case Enablon.Server.Nabsic.Tests.Tools.TypeUtilsFixture.Test: System.IO.FileLoadException: Impossible de charger le fichier ou l'assembly 'Enablon.Server.Nabsic, Version=0.0.0.0' ou une de ses dépendances. La définition trouvée du manifeste de l'assembly ne correspond pas à la référence de l'assembly. (Exception de HRESULT : 0x80131040)
Nom de fichier : 'Enablon.Server.Nabsic, Version=0.0.0.0'

Server stack trace: 
   à System.Reflection.RuntimeAssembly._nLoad(AssemblyName fileName, String codeBase, Evidence assemblySecurity, RuntimeAssembly locationHint, StackCrawlMark& stackMark, IntPtr pPrivHostBinder, Boolean throwOnFileNotFound, Boolean forIntrospection, Boolean suppressSecurityChecks)
   à System.Reflection.RuntimeAssembly.nLoad(AssemblyName fileName, String codeBase, Evidence assemblySecurity, RuntimeAssembly locationHint, StackCrawlMark& stackMark, IntPtr pPrivHostBinder, Boolean throwOnFileNotFound, Boolean forIntrospection, Boolean suppressSecurityChecks)
   à System.Reflection.RuntimeAssembly.InternalLoadAssemblyName(AssemblyName assemblyRef, Evidence assemblySecurity, RuntimeAssembly reqAssembly, StackCrawlMark& stackMark, IntPtr pPrivHostBinder, Boolean throwOnFileNotFound, Boolean forIntrospection, Boolean suppressSecurityChecks)
   à System.Reflection.Assembly.Load(AssemblyName assemblyRef)
   à Xunit.Sdk.TestAssembly.Deserialize(IXunitSerializationInfo info)
   à Xunit.Serialization.XunitSerializationInfo.DeserializeSerializable(Type type, String serializedValue)
   à Xunit.Serialization.XunitSerializationInfo.Deserialize(Type type, String serializedValue)
   à Xunit.Serialization.XunitSerializationInfo.DeserializeTriple(String value)
   à Xunit.Serialization.XunitSerializationInfo.DeserializeSerializable(Type type, String serializedValue)
   à Xunit.Serialization.XunitSerializationInfo.Deserialize(Type type, String serializedValue)
   à Xunit.Serialization.XunitSerializationInfo.DeserializeTriple(String value)
   à Xunit.Serialization.XunitSerializationInfo.DeserializeSerializable(Type type, String serializedValue)
   à Xunit.Serialization.XunitSerializationInfo.Deserialize(Type type, String serializedValue)
   à Xunit.Serialization.XunitSerializationInfo.DeserializeTriple(String value)
   à Xunit.Serialization.XunitSerializationInfo.DeserializeSerializable(Type type, String serializedValue)
   à Xunit.Serialization.XunitSerializationInfo.Deserialize(Type type, String serializedValue)
   à Xunit.Serialization.XunitSerializationInfo.DeserializeTriple(String value)
   à Xunit.Serialization.XunitSerializationInfo.DeserializeSerializable(Type type, String serializedValue)
   à Xunit.Serialization.XunitSerializationInfo.Deserialize(Type type, String serializedValue)
   à Xunit.Sdk.SerializationHelper.Deserialize[T](String serializedValue)
   à Xunit.Sdk.TestFrameworkExecutor`1.Deserialize(String value)
   à System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.StackBuilderSink._PrivateProcessMessage(IntPtr md, Object[] args, Object server, Object[]& outArgs)
   à System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.StackBuilderSink.SyncProcessMessage(IMessage msg)

Exception rethrown at [0]: 
   à System.Runtime.Remoting.Proxies.RealProxy.HandleReturnMessage(IMessage reqMsg, IMessage retMsg)
   à System.Runtime.Remoting.Proxies.RealProxy.PrivateInvoke(MessageData& msgData, Int32 type)
   à Xunit.Abstractions.ITestFrameworkExecutor.Deserialize(String value)
   à Xunit.Xunit2.Deserialize(String value)
   à Xunit.XunitFrontController.Deserialize(String value)
   à Xunit.Runner.VisualStudio.TestAdapter.VsTestRunner.Deserialize(LoggerHelper logger, ITestFrameworkExecutor executor, TestCase testCase)
```
